examples.korean: She was shaping to hit her second shot. 발음듣기 그녀는 두 번째 샷을 할 자세를 하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The sergeant stood to attention and saluted. 발음듣기 병장이 차렷 자세를 하고 거수 경례를 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sergeant stood to attention and saluted. 발음

examples.korean: The government has adopted an aggressive posture on immigration. 발음듣기 그 정부는 이민에 대해 공격적인 자세를 취해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government has adopted an aggressive posture on immigration. 발음

examples.korean: Back pains can be the result of bad posture. 발음듣기 요통[허리병]은 자세가 안 좋아서 생기는 결과일 수가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Back pains can be the result of bad posture. 발음

examples.korean: Good posture is essential when working at the computer. 발음듣기 컴퓨터로 작업을 할 때에는 좋은 자세가 필수적이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Good posture is essential when working at the computer. 발음
